'''Shock Effect''' is [[Ningguang]]'s Level 2 [[Constellation]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* The effect can trigger any time the Jade Screen is destroyed, including:
** When the Jade Screen's HP is reduced to 0 (e.g. by enemy attacks).
** When Ningguang uses [[Starshatter]].
** When Ningguang casts Jade Screen while another Jade Screen is still active (since only one may exist at a time).
* The effect does not produce a visual indicator on top of the character.
* The second Jade Screen will not produce any [[Energy|Elemental Particles]] if used within 6 seconds after the first.
